p: Installing automatic sprinklers, especially where people with limited mobility reside, is currently an issue in Canada. Price has always been claimed to be a serious obstacle. Functional measures with a better cost/benefit ratio, such as flashover prevention by water mist, can be considered [ 66]. Depleting the oxygen concentrations, while still keeping the respiration in balance, i.e., using inert gasses with added CO 2 for enhanced respiration, could also be considered if proven safe for the groups at risk [ 67]. Further research on alternative low cost fire suppression methods is encouraged.
